Header.title: WELCOME TO PELAH'S GLAM
Header.paragraph: Professional high-end and experienced makeup services for weddings, fashion shoots, special occassions, film and runway events

About.paragraph:
Hello there, My name is JACKLINE PELAH NAKANWAGI. I am a makeup artist based in Kampala, Uganda.
 I love the beauty around me – in nature, in somebody’s eyes, in art, in a beautiful soundtrack, in a movie. That’s why I feel really fortunate to be able to create beauty myself. Designing beautiful, effortless and timeless looks that my clients fall in love with makes me really happy
Why: A wide variety of makeup and hairstyles available
Unparalleled expertise in corrective and anti-ageing techniques
Why2: Natural beauty and skin care treatment
Assured Elevated experience that allows you to relax & enjoy your day
